title: Sun Microsystems - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet: Sun created the Java programming language, the Solaris operating system, the Network File System (NFS), and the SPARC instruction set. Sun was founded on February 24, 1982. Sun's headquarters were in Santa Clara, California.

title: Sun Microsystems Information
snippet: Sun Microsystems is an IT Services and IT Consulting, Custom Software & Technical Consulting, and Business/Productivity Software company located in Palo Alto, California with $55.8 billion in revenue and 5,073 employees.

title: Sun Microsystems 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook
snippet: Sun Microsystems is headquartered in Santa Clara, CA.

title: Sun Microsystems Inc, 2550 Garcia Ave, Mountain View, CA 94043, US - MapQuest
snippet: Sun Microsystems Inc, headquartered in Mountain View, California, was a prominent technology company known for its development of computer hardware and software, particularly in the UNIX operating system space.

title: Sun Microsystems Santa Clara Campus
snippet: The June Face to Face meeting of the QA Working Group will take place on Tuesday through Thursday, June 15, 16, and 17 on the Sun Microsystems campus in Santa Clara, California.
